nodes.bodyText: stream/foreach also works fine, if you prefer
FWIW It occurred to me over the weekend that maybe we could have just left the null values out of the row maps and kept the old structure. Just .filter(Objects::nonNull). No need to change it now.
Please use a fixed instant (e.g. with Instant.parse("")) so we don't have changing behavior between runs.
FWIW I will probably eventually make the snapshot timestamp and individual wannabe PK columns required in BQ, but this is fine for now.

nodes.bodyText: slightly out of scope, but it would be good to test both upload methods with a completely empty snapshot or snapshot with one table empty. We can either throw an IllegalArgumentException or treat it as valid (e.g. for brand-new environments).
